name: Postscript
headline: The SMS revenue platform for e-commerce merchants
description:
We are building the #1 revenue channel for ecommerce. Top customers include Ruggable, Dr. Squatch, Thrive Cosmetics, and 10,000 more.

Postscript generates more than $2B/yr in e-commerce revenue for our merchants, growing ~2x per year. Our goal is to generate $1T+ per year in e-commerce revenue.

Interesting challenges:
- Massive Scale
- Real-time conversations across 100M phones

founders.name: Alex Beller, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Postscript. Overseeing all things revenue & people.

## Finally—AI that Unlocks Incremental Revenue
Powerful AI features that are constantly working to put more money in your pocket. 
Brand Center
### Train AI on your brand voice
Train the AI model on your unique brand voice, with multiple checkpoints to review AI-generated copy and provide feedback before texts are sent.
AI Infinity Testing
### Optimize, infinitely.
Explores thousands of message variants and optimizes to drive an average 20% increase in revenue on your highest ROI flows.
Conversation Intelligence
### Uncover customer insights
Quickly analyze trends and uncover insights within thousands of in-depth SMS Sales conversations with your subscribers.

generated_description:
**Postscript: The SMS Revenue Engine for E-commerce**

Founded in 2018, Postscript is in the business of supercharging e-commerce through SMS marketing. The company's mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to become the leading revenue channel for online merchants, aiming for a staggering $1 trillion a year in e-commerce revenue. So far, they've generated over $5 billion annually for their clients, with some marquee names like Ruggable, Dr. Squatch, and Thrive Cosmetics among the 10,000+ brands that rely on their platform.

**Growth Metrics and Challenges**

What’s truly impressive is the growth trajectory—Postscript is scaling at about 100% year-over-year. This compelling performance comes with its own set of challenges, primarily managing massive scale and facilitating real-time conversations across 100 million devices. The founders understand that as e-commerce evolves, so must their solutions.

**The Technology Behind Their Success**

Harnessing the power of SMS, Postscript offers a suite of tools designed to increase customer engagement and transaction rates. They focus on SMS marketing, AI-driven messaging, cashback incentives, and proactive sales tactics. Their platform enables merchants to not only grow their subscriber list but also tailor their messaging for better customer experiences.

Postscript's advanced AI capabilities allow brands to optimize their communications, driving an average 20% increase in revenue. This is music to the ears of e-commerce brands looking to maximize their revenue streams while keeping their operations lean.

**Team and Ecosystem**

With a dedicated team of 180, Postscript is supported by Y Combinator, which it joined in its Winter 2019 batch. The company is led by Group Partner Michael Seibel, whose expertise in nurturing startups has contributed to Postscript’s rapid rise.

**The Bottom Line**

In a landscape where e-commerce is increasingly competitive, Postscript stands out as a potent tool for driving sales and fostering customer loyalty through SMS. Their clients have reported not only incremental revenue but a genuine partnership that feels like an extension of their own teams. It’s clear that when it comes to SMS marketing, Postscript is making a significant mark—one text at a time.

For more insights and demo bookings, visit [Postscript](https://postscript.io).
